page.title: 15LANDSCAPE OF TRIGON ESTATE/1
page.content: Trigon is a private estate owned by the Sturdy family. It covers l,400 acres altogether, comprising of:- 550 acres are farmland 400 acres is working forest 450 acres is heathland/wasteland Once the land was mainly heathland with the river Piddle or Trent running through. Now the land is turning to pasture and forestry. Both hardwood and softwoods have been planted. The following comes from an 8 year olds research:- "On Trigon there are lots of woods. When you drive on the road quietly, you can see deer running about. They are roe deer. In some places there are piles of pine trees which have been cut down. On the farm there are thirty-two different fields. There is a big house owned by Mr. Sturdy, and I have been in it.
